00033 #define MAXBASISSTATES 500
00034 
00035 
00036 inline int SQR(int i) { return i*i; }
00037 
00038 void writeprojectedOvlaps(FILE* fp,
00039                           const Projection* P,
00040                           const complex double** ovlap,
00041                           const Eigenstates* E)
00042 {
00043   int odd=P->odd;
00044   int jmax=P->jmax;
00045 
00046   int p,j,i;
00047 
00048   char prefix[8];
00049 
00050   int* idx;
00051   int ngood;
00052   complex double *norm;
00053   complex double *H, *Ovlap;
00054   
00055 
00056   for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00057     for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2) {
00058       
00059       ngood = E->ngood[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00060 
00061       if (ngood) {
00062 
00063         if(odd) sprintf(prefix, "[%d/2%c]", j, p ? '-' : '+'); 
00064         else    sprintf(prefix, "[%d%c]", j/2, p ? '-' : '+'); 
00065 
00066         idx = E->index[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00067         norm = E->norm[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00068         H = E->v[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00069 
00070         Ovlap = ovlap[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00071 
00072         fprintf(fp, "\n%s N     = ", prefix); 
00073         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00074           fprintf(fp, "   %8.5f", creal(norm[idx[i]]));
00075         fprintf(fp, "\n%s H     = ", prefix); 
00076         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00077           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", hbc*creal(H[idx[i]]));
00078         fprintf(fp, "\n%s Ovlap = ", prefix); 
00079         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00080           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", creal(Ovlap[idx[i]]/norm[idx[i]]));
00081         fprintf(fp, "\n");        
00082       }
00083     }
00084 }

00086 
00087 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00088 {
00089   createinfo(argc, argv);
00090 
00091   /* enough arguments ? */
00092 
00093   if (argc < 2) {
00094     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s mcstate basistates\n", argv[0]);
00095     exit(-1);
00096   }
00097 
00098   char* multiconfigfile = argv[optind];
00099   char** mbfile;
00100 
00101   // open multiconfigfile
00102   Projection P;
00103   SlaterDet* Q;
00104   Symmetry* S;
00105   Eigenstates E;
00106   int n;
00107 
00108   if (readMulticonfigfile(multiconfigfile, &mbfile, &P, &Q, &S, &E, &n))
00109     exit(-1);
00110 
00111   char* basisfile = argv[optind+1];
00112   char* mbbfile[MAXBASISSTATES];
00113   int nb;
00114 
00115   if (readstringsfromfile(basisfile, &nb, mbbfile))
00116     exit(-1);
00117 
00118   SlaterDet Qb[nb]; 
00119   Symmetry Sb[nb];
00120 
00121   int i;
00122   for (i=0; i<nb; i++) {
00123     extractSymmetryfromString(&mbbfile[i], &Sb[i]);
00124     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Qb[i], mbbfile[i]))
00125       exit(-1);
00126   }
00127 
00128 
00129   // calculate overlaps for basis states
00130  
00131   complex double** ovlbbme[nb*nb];
00132 
00133   int a,b;
00134   for (b=0; b<nb; b++)
00135     for (a=0; a<nb; a++)
00136       ovlbbme[a+b*nb] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOvlap);
00137 
00138   for (b=0; b<nb; b++)
00139     for (a=0; a<nb; a++) {
00140       if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbbfile[a], mbbfile[b], &P, 
00141                                     &OpOvlap, Sb[a], Sb[b], ovlbbme[a+b*nb])) {
00142         calcprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOvlap, &Qb[a], &Qb[b], 
00143                           Sb[a], Sb[b], ovlbbme[a+b*nb]);
00144         writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbbfile[a], mbbfile[b], &P, 
00145                                  &OpOvlap, Sb[a], Sb[b], ovlbbme[a+b*nb]);
00146       }
00147     }
00148 
00149   // calculate overlaps between eigenstate and basis states
00150 
00151   complex double** ovlbme[n*nb];
00152   for (b=0; b<nb; b++)
00153     for (a=0; a<n; a++)
00154       ovlbme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOvlap);
00155 
00156   for (b=0; b<nb; b++)
00157     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00158       if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile[a], mbbfile[b], &P, 
00159                                     &OpOvlap, S[a], Sb[b], ovlbme[a+b*n])) {
00160         calcprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOvlap, &Q[a], &Qb[b], 
00161                           S[a], Sb[b], ovlbme[a+b*n]);
00162         writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfile[a], mbbfile[b], &P, 
00163                                  &OpOvlap, S[a], Sb[b], ovlbme[a+b*n]);
00164       }
00165     }
00166 
00167   
00168   // evaluate matrix elements of one-operator
00169   // implent Symmetries !
00170 
00171   ManyBodyOperator OpOne = {
00172     name : "One",
00173     rank : 0,
00174     pi : 0,
00175     dim : 1,
00176     size : 1,
00177     par : NULL,
00178     me : NULL
00179   };
00180 
00181   // use full set of basis states (all J,M,K projections)
00182   // using K mixing eigenstates would require to solve the
00183   // eigenvalue problem for each basis state
00184 
00185   int jmax = P.jmax;
00186   
00187   complex double** oneme[n*n];
00188   for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00189     for (a=0; a<n; a++)
00190       oneme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOne);
00191 
00192   complex double *nbbwork = malloc(SQR((jmax+1)*nb)*sizeof(complex double));
00193   complex double *obbwork = malloc(SQR((jmax+1)*nb)*sizeof(complex double));
00194   complex double *obbcovlwork = malloc(SQR(jmax+1)*nb*n*sizeof(complex double));
00195 
00196   // loop over parity and angular momenta
00197 
00198   fprintf(stderr, "... preparing basis-one operator\n");
00199       
00200   int p,j,idx;
00201   for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00202     for (j=P.odd; j<P.jmax; j=j+2) {
00203       idx = idxpij(P.jmax, p, j);
00204 
00205       // calculate overlap matrix
00206 
00207       fprintf(stderr, "\tj: %d, p: %d basis overlap matrix\n", j, p);
00208 
00209       complex double (*nbb)[(j+1)*nb] = nbbwork;
00210       int ab,bb,kab,kbb;
00211 
00212       for (bb=0; bb<nb; bb++)
00213         for (kbb=-j; kbb<=j; kbb=kbb+2)
00214           for (ab=0; ab<nb; ab++)
00215             for (kab=-j; kab<=j; kab=kab+2)
00216                  
00217               nbb[idxnjm(ab,j,kab)][idxnjm(bb,j,kbb)] =
00218                 ovlbbme[ab+nb*bb][idx][idxjmk(j,kab,kbb)];
00219 
00220       // invert overlap matrix
00221           
00222       double thresh = 1e-5;
00223       complex double (*obb)[(j+1)*nb] = obbwork;
00224       pseudoinverse(nbb, obb, (j+1)*nb, thresh);
00225  
00226       // calculate one operator matrix element
00227 
00228       fprintf(stderr, "\tj: %d, p: %d basis one matrix\n", j, p);
00229 
00230       complex double (*obbcovl)[n*(j+1)] = obbcovlwork;
00231 
00232       int ka,kb;
00233 
00234       for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00235         for (ab=0; ab<nb; ab++)
00236           for (kb=-j; kb<=j; kb=kb+2)
00237             for (kab=-j; kab<=j; kab=kab+2) {
00238               obbcovl[idxnjm(ab,j,kab)][idxnjm(b,j,kb)] = 0.0;
00239 
00240               for (bb=0; bb<nb; bb++)
00241                 for (kbb=-j; kbb<=j; kbb=kbb+2)
00242                   obbcovl[idxnjm(ab,j,kab)][idxnjm(b,j,kb)] +=
00243                     obb[idxnjm(ab,j,kab)][idxnjm(bb,j,kbb)]*
00244                     conj(ovlbme[b+n*bb][idx][idxjmk(j,kb,kbb)]);
00245             }
00246 
00247       for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00248         for (a=0; a<n; a++)
00249           for (kb=-j; kb<=j; kb=kb+2)
00250             for (ka=-j; ka<=j; ka=ka+2) {
00251               oneme[a+b*n][idx][idxjmk(j,ka,kb)] = 0.0;
00252 
00253               for (ab=0; ab<nb; ab++)
00254                 for (kab=-j; kab<=j; kab=kab+2)
00255                   oneme[a+b*n][idx][idxjmk(j,ka,kb)] +=
00256                     ovlbme[a+n*ab][idx][idxjmk(j,ka,kab)]*
00257                     obbcovl[idxnjm(ab,j,kab)][idxnjm(b,j,kb)];
00258             }             
00259 
00260     }
00261 
00262   // expectation values of one operator
00263 
00264   fprintf(stderr, "... calculate expectation values\n");
00265   
00266   complex double **oneexp = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpOne, n);
00267   calcexpectprojectedMBME(&P, &OpOne, oneme, S, &E, oneexp);
00268 
00269   // output
00270 
00271   char outfile[1024];
00272   FILE* outfp;
00273 
00274   snprintf(outfile, 1024, "%s.basisovlap-%s", 
00275            stripstr(multiconfigfile, ".states"), basisfile);
00276   if (!(outfp = fopen(outfile, "w"))) {
00277     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfile);
00278     exit(-1);
00279   }
00280 
00281   fprintinfo(outfp);
00282 
00283   writeprojectedOvlaps(outfp, &P, oneexp, &E);
00284 
00285   fclose(outfp);
00286 
00287 }
